help-file.title: VINES
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Protection
The spell "Vines" encases the Druid in a shell of vines grown from herbs. When successful, the vines will absorb damage from magical or physical attacks. But, if the Druid moves, the vines will instantly rot and fade away.
NOTE: You must have at least (one) herb in your inventory, in order for this spell to take effect.
